overview: Season of Wonder is a cine-poetic work that situates us amongst the irregular cycles of a destabilized world.  It intertwines that which I witness with that which I imagine. A perceptual blur arises, where the freakish quietly morphs into the everyday. I am working in the area of unnatural history in an intervened place. Cycles of time are disrupted, and loss is complicated with the spark of possibilities.
title: Season of Wonder
